name: test_script_addr_length
description:
Check that script address length is the same as length of other addresses.

        There was an issue that script address was 32 bytes instead of 28 bytes.
descriptionHtml:
Check that script address length is the same as length of other addresses.

    There was an issue that script address was 32 bytes instead of 28 bytes.
